Text: Broadway Across America Ticket Request ProcessedYour order has been processed by our staff has been charged to your credit card Your account number is Seat and Rows Information Cats Sunday December pm Orchestra row H seats Please review the following information regarding your tickets for the Houston Broadway Series Season ticket packets which include all of your tickets and other helpful information will be sent to you by mail approximately one month prior to your first performance If you wish to purchase tickets to season specials later select the Buy Season Tickets button from within your city at BroadwaySeriescom You will be asked for your account number and zip code during the process so that we may add your new selections to your order If you have any questions or need more information visit the Houston page on Broadwayseriescom or simply call our Season Ticket Hotline at Once again THANK YOU for being a part of the Houston Broadway Series We value your support and look forward to helping you enjoy the season Sincerely The Houston Broadway Series

BroadwayAcrossAmericacom Ticket Request ReceivedThank you for using broadwayaccrosamericacom for all of your THE LION KING ticketing needs Your order has been received and is being processed You will recieve a confirmation notice within four weeks You should receive your THE LION KING tickets by mail before the end of the year If you have requested an exchange to your performance we will make our best efforts to accommodate your request Any additional costs associated with an exchange request will be charged at the time they are made If you have questions or need more information log on to the Houston page at broadwayacrossamericacom or simply call your Season Ticket Hotline at Thank you for your patronage We value your support and look forward to helping you enjoy the season Sincerely
